thread.title: They've Found a New Human Species in South Africa
thread.title_full: They've Found a New Human Species in South Africa - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: They've Found a New Human Species in South Africa
text: A new study in the journal eLife announces the discovery of a previously unknown human species that lived in what is now South Africa many millennia ago. The species was documented based on skeletal remains recovered from a cave not far from the city of Johannesburg in South Africa's Gauteng province, in the Cradle of Humankind World Heritage Site. Archaeologists have until now retrieved around 1,550 bones belonging to as many as 15 individuals, both adults and childre... Â»
